sentences.en: APEC seems be drowning in an ocean of jargon.
sentences.cn: 亚太经合组织似乎为一大堆空洞的胡言乱语所淹没。

sentences.en: Gannets are denizens of the open ocean.
sentences.cn: 鲣鸟栖息在外海地区。

sentences.en: His abiding passion was ocean racing, at which he scored many successes.
sentences.cn: 他一直酷爱海上赛艇，并多次在比赛中获胜。

sentences.en: I like to swim in the ocean when it’s warm enough.
sentences.cn: 海水足够暖的时候，我喜欢在海里游泳。

sentences.en: It is like fishing for a needle in the ocean.
sentences.cn: 这就像大海捞针.

sentences.en: More than 20 helicopters began swooping in low over the ocean.
sentences.cn: 20多架直升机开始下降向海面俯冲。

sentences.en: Ocean waves are gradually eating away the coastal rocks.
sentences.cn: 海浪正在慢慢地侵蚀着岸边的岩石.

sentences.en: One afternoon, she went for a swim in the ocean.
sentences.cn: 一天下午她到海里去游泳.

sentences.en: Our boat would not have been appropriate for ocean voyaging.
sentences.cn: 我们的船只本不适合海上航行。

sentences.en: She stood on the beach, gazing at the ocean.
sentences.cn: 她站在海滩上，凝视着大海。

sentences.en: The Atlantic Ocean had undergone changes in temperature and salinity.
sentences.cn: 大西洋海水的温度和盐度已经发生了变化。

sentences.en: The cape extends far into the ocean.
sentences.cn: 那海岬伸向海洋远处。

sentences.en: the depths of the ocean
sentences.cn: 海洋的深处

sentences.en: The mountains trap rains and fogs generated over the ocean.
sentences.cn: 这些山脉隔开了海洋上生成的雨和雾。

sentences.en: The ocean waves are slowly eating away the coastal rocks.
sentences.cn: 大海的波浪慢慢地侵蚀着岸边的岩石.

sentences.en: the Pacific Ocean
sentences.cn: 太平洋

sentences.en: The Pacific Ocean is the biggest ocean in the earth.
sentences.cn: 太平洋是地球上最大的海洋.

sentences.en: These ocean fogs can last for days.
sentences.cn: 这种海上大雾可持续数天。

sentences.en: They are found in every ocean, from the surface to the deep sea.
sentences.cn: 你可以在每一个海洋找到它们，从海平面到深海区。

sentences.en: They spend hours feeding on the ocean floor.
sentences.cn: 它们花好几个小时在海底进食。

sentences.en: Tourists sunbathe and frolic in the ocean.
sentences.cn: 游客晒着日光浴在海水里嬉戏。

words.tran_cn: 海洋的；海洋产出的；在海洋中生活的；广阔无垠的

phrases.tran_cn: 深海；深海的；深深的海洋
远洋班轮；远洋定期客轮

trans.tran_cn: 洋，海洋，大海，（地球上划分出的）洋
trans.tran_en: the great mass of salt water that covers most of the Earth’s surface
